message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $14,000 reflects the true value, I'm willing to come down to $12,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
